overview:
Currently working as a freelance Web Developer, SEO, Internet Marketer, and Social Media Marketer.

What does Dan Bochichio “Bring to the table?” - On Squidoo, I provide resourceful pages about gaming, web design, SEO, locations, and products that get the “Dan Bochichio Stamp of Approval”. Facebook is mostly for people I went to school with or work with professionally. I use Twitter as my “playzone in Social Media” - my tweets range from useful SEO tips, rants about my day, awesome discoveries, and classic gaming news. My Reddit time is spent almost exclusively trolling the gaming section, while on LinkedIn I’m most active in the Web Design & SEO side of things.

Dan Bochichio was born in 1984 and grew up in Mahopac, NY, a small town in Putnam County. After graduating high school, Dan Bochichio attended Westchester Community College for a year before deciding to transfer to Purchase College for their New Media program. While in school, Dan Bochichio worked at the White Plains Youth Bureau and interned for Purchase College’s TV station (PTV). Shortly after graduating from Purchase College, Dan Bochichio moved to Albany, New York.

You can network with Dan Bochichio on Twitter, Facebook, StumbleUpon, Reddit, LinkedIn, and of course Squidoo.
